title: The TDR of lands owned by Central Govt
clause_text: The TDR of lands owned by Central Govt./State Govt. and it’s undertakings and which are allotted by payment of market value & which are reserved in Development plan for public purpose shall be eligible. . However, TDR shall not be eligible to the lands under reservations which are granted on lease at concessional rates by the Central Govt. and State Govt.
section: CASES ELIGIBLE FOR TRANSFERABLE DEVELOPMENT RIGHTS (TDR):-
